name: @brikcss/flipper
description: Flipper is a front end web module that flips things. In style. Flipper can flip an element in place or open it up to a modal dialog.
author: The Zimmee <thezimmee@gmail.com>

scripts.// [GIT|HUSKY]: // Helpers for interacting with git and husky (githooks).
scripts.commit:
echo "See the 'git commit policy' section in CONTRIBUTING.md for details on how to create your commit message.
" && git-cz
scripts.// [WATCH]: // For local development, watches files and serves them up with live reload. NOTE: dev/watch does not run any production tasks, such as minifying files.
scripts.watch: concurrently --raw "npm run js:watch" "npm run sass:watch" "npm run watch:serve"
scripts.// [BUILD]: // Builds files for distribution, including both development and production tasks.
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently --names sass:lint,sass:link,sass:build,js:build --kill-others-on-fail "npm run sass:build:lint" "npm run sass:build:compile" "npm run sass:build:link" "npm run js:build" && echo 'DONE!' || echo 'Uh oh... Houston, we have a problem...' && exit 1
scripts.// [JS]: // Builds all JS flavors with webpack.
scripts.// [SASS]: // SASS tasks. NOTE: sass:compile does not produce any output; it only serves as a parent task for other css tasks.
scripts.sass:watch: chokidar src/sass/*.scss examples/example.scss -c 'npm run sass:compile -- --file={path} && echo "[SASS] Linter complete."' --verbose
